summary:
A reworked Version of my old Follower.
Can be used with any male Body. Made to use with S.A.M or SOS
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][size=3][img]https://i.imgur.com/bEH6G6l.png[/img]

[color=#b6d7a8]Thor is an [u]Male loving[/u] Guy who loves to fight against enemies and for love. XP[u][b]
[/b][/u]Of course he will love your Girls aswell.. ;P
He can be found at Honningbrew Meadery, using a one handed axe and heavy armor[/color]

[color=#b6d7a8]-Based of my own OC[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]-Standalone, no other Mods needed, but recommanded[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]-Can be married[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]-Levels with the player till max.150[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]-Can't die
-SOS Version comes with Body Tattoos[/color]


[color=#6aa84f][b][img]https://i.imgur.com/GywEse2.png[/img][/b][/color]

[color=#b6d7a8]S.A.M - Shape Atlas for Men from vectorplexus.com[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Young Geonox Face for SAM (S.A.M) https://www.vectorplexus.com/files/file/26-younger-geonox-face-for-sam/[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Schlongs of Skyrim https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/498-sos-schlongs-of-skyrim/[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox (SOS) https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/?
Northborn Scar https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279
Beards https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Follower Overhaul Mod like EFF, AFT, UFO [/color]


[color=#6aa84f][b][img]https://i.imgur.com/Lc4E5uf.png[/img][/b][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66630/?]Loks Eyes Standalone with and without glow[/url][color=#b6d7a8] by Lokels[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39609/?]SOS - Custom Body Textures for Schlongs of Skyrim[/url][color=#b6d7a8] by Lord Skass[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73605/?]Ixum's Tattoos[/url][color=#b6d7a8] by Ixum[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Bethesda for creating Skyrim


[img]https://i.imgur.com/2Wd8g1i.png[/img]
